content: weave in the yarn of purple yarn tail make a purple ring around the edges of each round place the onion on top of the tomato top bun golden wheat round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 1 make 2 half_double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts round 5 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts fasten_off and cut about 100 cm tie a knot leave a 45 cm yarn of beige yarn tail weave up and down around the bun to make the seeds inside of top burger start with beige round 1 make a magic_ring chain 2 into the magic_ring make 10 double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 10 sts round 2 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in each st around join with a slip_stitch 20 sts round 3 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet in the first st followed by 1 double_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 30 sts for round 3 stop complete the slip tie a knot and cut continue to before the slip_stitch with the next off the previous round 4 using stitch colour golden colour beige golden wheat wheat yarn rember to work around the yarn tails to hide them round 4 chain 1 make 1 single_crochet in the first followed by 2 single_crochet in the next st then 1 single_crochet in the next st repeat around join with a slip_stitch 40 sts fasten_off and sew together go stop about ¾ the then finish weave in the yarn through the front way around and sewing shut tie a tail loop of the top stuff don t stuff knot cut the yarn bun and the back too full tail short then pull loop of the inside the yarn into the bun bun to hide it now place the bun on top link to video https //youtu be/dsog5-ksmto if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
